$$
\hat{\text{lived\_after}} = 58.30 + 0.15 \cdot \text{sex}_{\text{Male}} - 0.68 \cdot \text{election\_age}
$$





Political candidates' health are highly maligned due to travel schedules and human stress. A data source examines how long candidates live after being elected. A potential weakness in this model is the risk that behaviors have changed so much since the 1800s so the model can be inaccurate.
